name: Crazymals: Jungle Adventure
description: Everyone went crazy in the jungle! And it's no accident... A terrible monster has been waiting for centuries to wake up and break free! As soon as he broke out, streams of water gushed up from under the ground. And now our heroes have to escape the flood hazard and not fall prey to the evil sharp-toothed monster! Score points, unlock new charachters. Share your records with your friends and get awards. Hurry up! The fate of jungle is in your hands!
